name: portfront
description: A portfolio detailing my experience as a web developer

scripts.postinstall: cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist src/assets/bootstrap/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css src/assets/font-awesome/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts src/assets/font-awesome/ && cp -r images/ src/assets/images/ && gulp sass

author: Andre Noberto
